name: tavily_search_advance
description: Advanced Tavily tool for web search or URL content extraction. Use 'search' for researching topics, use 'extract' for getting content from specific URLs.

type.description: Operation type: 'search' for web search, 'extract' for extracting content from URLs

urls.description: List of URLs to extract content from (required for type='extract')

search_depth.description: Search/extract depth - use 'advanced' for comprehensive results

max_results.description: Maximum number of search results (default: 5, max: 7)

include_raw_content.description: Include raw page content in search results

chunks_per_source.description: Number of content chunks per source (default: 3)

include_domains.description: Limit search to these domains only
